DOC.brief_summary: Desmopressin in treatment of nocturnal enuresis (bedwetting).
DOC.brief_title: MINRIN® Orally Disintegrating Tablet (Fast Dissolving Desmopressin) and Tablets in Treatment of Primary Nocturnal Enuresis
DOC.criteria: Treatment of primary nocturnal enuresis within an overall therapeutical concept, eg, in cases of failure of other nonmedicinal therapies or with indication of a medicinal therapy caused by nocturnal ADH deficiency The patients and their parents have been informed about the study and have given their written consent for participation. The prescription of Minirin® tablets / Minirin® orally disintegrating tablet (fast dissolving desmopressin) is contraindicated
